extracted_information: The MR PORTER mobile app offers a streamlined shopping experience for luxury menswear, available on iOS and Android. It focuses on 'Simple On-The-Go Shopping' and a 'fast and fuss-free experience'. The app integrates shopping with editorial content from 'The Journal', providing style advice and news. Its luxury positioning is reinforced by offering products from over 600 leading menswear brands and exclusive collections.

features.name: Shopping
features.description: Shop the latest products from over 600 leading menswear brands.

features.name: Wish List Management
features.description: Manage personal Wish List and browse new arrivals three times a week.

features.name: Content Integration (The Journal)
features.description: Access 'The Journal' for up-to-the-moment style advice, daily new features on menâ€™s style, fashion, lifestyle, and grooming news from seasoned Editors. Seamless shopping from editorial stories.

features.name: Push Notifications
features.description: Receive alerts about new brands, exclusive collections, and sales.

features.name: Payment Card Scan
features.description: Use card scan feature for quick and accurate input of payment details.
